original_title: Ancient Extraterrestrials: Aliens and UFOs Before the Dawn of Time
overview: Zecharia Sitchin is the author of the successful book series "The Earth Chronicles." Join this amazing scholar as he makes a scientific and scholarly argument for ancient visits to our Earth. Sitchin gives a compelling and entertaining presentation detailing the evidence that ancient aliens from other worlds have not only visited the earth but plan to return.
tagline: Aliens And UFOs Before The Dawn Of Time
title: Ancient Extraterrestrials: Aliens and UFOs Before the Dawn of Time
